ourServicesDescription: Renting different sizes of construction dumpsters and different types of scaffolding. By just easy steps, it will be delivered to your site.
ourProductsDescription: You can buy any building & finishing materials as per your location & time schedule without contacting with any person.
ourTrucksDescription: Need to transfer your materials?Rent the right truck type to suit your materials volume with the right price
paymentAndSecurityDescription: Pay with Mada, Visa/Mater Card and Apple pay for a secure & hands free deals, or choose cash on delivery option.
locationDescription: Please select your site location. This location will be used to show the services & delivering your items. You can edit this location at any time.
useLocationMessage1: This app wants to change your device settings.
useLocationMessage2: Use Wifi and mobile networks for location
exitApp: Are you sure you want to exit this application?
incorrectCredentials: You have entered an incorrect username or password
notASupplier: You are not registered as a Supplier on this account
notADriver: You are not registered as a Driver on this account
selectService: You must select at least one service
name: Name
